chunk:
Anokha Sake & Sandalwood Facial Lotion

Brand: Anokha

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: aqua/water/eau, Oryza sativa (rice) bran oil, glycerin, polyglyceryl-2 stearate, rice ferment filtrate (sake), stearyl alcohol, glyceryl stearate, Centella asiatica (gotu kola) extract, benzyl alcohol, allantoin, Santalum album (sandalwood) wood oil, acacia Senegal gum, xanthan gum, Citrus aurantium (bergamot) peel oil*,

glyceryl stearate, Centella asiatica (gotu kola) extract, benzyl alcohol, allantoin, Santalum album (sandalwood) wood oil, acacia Senegal gum, xanthan gum, Citrus aurantium (bergamot) peel oil*, leuconostoc/radish root ferment filtrate, benzoic acid, dehydroacetic acid, citric acid, farnesol**, limonene**, linalool**
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
